preferences.name: API Key
preferences.description: API key required to access the Trello API. You can yours from here

preferences.name: API token
preferences.description: API Token required to access tjr Trello API. You can yours after generating your API key

preferences.name: Webapp Command
preferences.description: A command to launch it as a webapp. E.g. chromium

preferences.name: App Class
preferences.description: App class to launch it as webapp. Find it in your Trello Webapp shortcut

preferences.name: User Data Dir
preferences.description: Webapp user profile. Find it in your Trello Webapp shortcut
